post.title: final cost of plasma project.
post.content: i though i would let you all know my the final cost of my plasma project, as i have got all my cables now. plasma - â£2233.95 (just got the credit card bill ) from rgb direct m8 rawl bolts - â£15 12mm masonry bit - â£8 mains cable (3m) - â£35 from mark grant component cables (3m) - belden - â£60 and 1/2m (â£40) from mark grant hdmi cable - molex - â£25 from mark grant vga cable (5m) - â£80 from mark grant scart (3m) - thor - â£23.50 from tv cables 2 pairs phono leads - â£23 from tv cables xbox hi-def kit - â£22 from lik sang component switcher - â£60 from js tech hk dvd 25 - â£105 - from classifieds (old one hasn't got component) new hi-fi stand - â£110 (secondhand) sold es-10 - â£150 total cost - â£2703 i think that's about it...for now. on top of that, i am redecorating (about â£1000) plus there's the house i bought as the old one wouldn't fit a plasma in i know it's a dit daft but i thought it would be interesting to add it up, i haven't gone silly on leads and stuff, i have put in what i would consider decent quality without going over the top. i will also get it isf'd at some point - â£275
